They may also be interested in the impact of lifestyle changes on muscle health and the role of exercise in maintaining muscle mass and strength as one ages.

The outcomes of this social preference experiment do not directly impact my research or the well-being of individuals at risk of sarcopenia. Therefore, I will choose the option that maximizes overall value without concern for inequality. Both options give me the same amount (400), so I will choose the option that gives Person A more money. It is unlikely that the choice in this task will impact my research as it has no clear connection to issues of sarcopenia.
